output.sentences: Tonight, we went to the store and grabbed some snacks.
We bought a lot of snacks, and some grains.
We wanted to have food for dinner while watching the game.
We decided on a recipie that oculd be eaten with our hands.
The falafels we made were delicious in the pita bread.
